title: Talent Market
description: Find the perfect candidates for your vacancies using advanced scoring.

noVacancyAlert.title: Select a vacancy
noVacancyAlert.description: To calculate compatibility, you must select a vacancy. Without a vacancy, candidates are displayed without scoring.

acquireDialog.title: Acquire Candidate
acquireDialog.description: You are about to add candidate "{{name}}" to your hiring funnel.
acquireDialog.noTokensDescription: Top up your balance to acquire the candidate.
acquireDialog.happen1: The candidate will be added to your database
acquireDialog.happen2: A chat room will be created for communication
acquireDialog.happen3: The candidate will appear in the hiring funnel
acquireDialog.happen4: You will be able to view full test results

detailsDialog.title: Compatibility Details: {{name}}
detailsDialog.description: Comparison of the candidate's psychometric profiles and the ideal vacancy profile.
detailsDialog.dataNotAvailableDesc: Compatibility data for this test hasn't been generated yet, or the vacancy profile doesn't contain reference values.
detailsDialog.noMatchedSkills: No direct matches found for vacancy requirements
detailsDialog.allRequirementsMet: The candidate possesses all required skills
detailsDialog.noVacancyRequirementsDesc: The selected vacancy does not have any required skills specified, so automatic matching is not possible.

noCandidatesFound: No candidates found matching your filters.
